entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who hears the noise and tries to get Hagrid's attention.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is present with Harry when they hear the noise and helps rescue Hagrid.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is also present with Harry and Hermione, and helps rescue Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who is making the noise and is found crying in his cabin.

relationships.description: Harry helps Hagrid by calling out to him when he hears the noise and tries to get his attention.
Hermione helps Hagrid by rescuing him from Harry's neck when he collapses under Hagrid's weight.
Ron helps Hagrid by rescuing him from Harry's neck and helping to get him back into the cabin.
